trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule"></xref> class.
You can use the ProfileEventArgs class during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 ProfileEventArgs 類別期間<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件，以指定自訂使用者設定檔。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If, when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, the ProfileEventArgs parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> has its <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property set to a value that’s not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> uses the value of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A> property in the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果時<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件完成時，ProfileEventArgs 參數<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler>具有其<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>屬性設定為不是值`null`，然後<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>會使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>中的屬性</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A>的值</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Profile%2A></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs"></xref> class.

The ProfileEventArgs creates an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> class and sets the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A> property to the specified <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: ProfileEventArgs 建立執行個體的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>類別，並設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A>為指定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>屬性</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs.Context%2A></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the current request.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> object provides event information to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>物件提供的事件資訊至<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件的<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>類別。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The Context property provides access to the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> of the current request.
trans-unit.target: 內容屬性可存取<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>目前的要求。</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request
Gets or sets the user profile for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前要求的使用者設定檔。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Profile property during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event to specify a custom user profile.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用設定檔屬性期間<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件，以指定自訂使用者設定檔。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: If, when the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs> parameter of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler> has its Profile property set to a value that’s not `null`, then the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> uses the value of the Profile property in the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果當<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件完成時，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs>參數<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler>其設定檔屬性所設定的值不是`null`，然後<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>會使用目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>中設定檔屬性的值</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventHandler></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileEventArgs></xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> does not set the Profile property for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event.
The <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule> only gets the value of the Profile property when the code in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event completes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>只會取得設定檔屬性的值時中的程式碼<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件完成。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> </xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule>

trans-unit.source: If the Profile property is not explicitly set by application code during the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize> event, the Profile property value will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定檔屬性未明確設定應用程式碼期間<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>事件，此設定檔屬性值會是`null`。</xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileModule.Personalize>

trans-unit.source: The user profile to use for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 使用目前要求的使用者設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
